resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157261</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching the concept of Chemical Bonding in high-school: Developing and implementing a new framework based on the analysis of misleading systemic factors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichten des Konzeptes des chemischen 
Abbindens in der High School: Einen neuen Rahmen entwickeln und 
einführend basiert auf der Analyse des Irreführens von von 
Körperfaktoren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignement du concept de la liaison chimique 
dans le lycée : Développant et mettant en application un 
nouveau cadre basé sur l'analyse de tromper des facteurs 
systémiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensinando o conceito da ligação química na High
School: Desenvolvendo e executando uma estrutura nova baseada na
análise de misleading fatores systemic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzione del concetto di bonding chimico nella 
High School: Sviluppando ed effettuando una nuova struttura 
basata sull'analisi di fuorviare i fattori sistematici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία της έννοιας της χημικής σύνδεσης στο 
υψηλός-σχολείο: Αναπτυσσόμενος και εφαρμόζοντας ένα νέο 
πλαίσιο βασισμένο στην ανάλυση των παραπλανητικών συστημικών 
παραγόντων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñanza del concepto de la vinculación 
química en High School secundaria: Desarrollando y poniendo un 
nuevo marco en ejecucio'n basado en el análisis de engañar factores 
systemic</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This dissertation consists of a diagnostic study, followed by curricular development and implementation regarding the teaching of the bonding concept.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">curriculum development</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissertation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abhandlung besteht aus einer Diagnosestudie,
gefolgt von der Lehrplanentwicklung und von der Implementierung 
betreffend ist den Unterricht des Abbindenkonzeptes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette dissertation se compose d'une étude 
diagnostique, suivie du développement et de la mise en place 
curriculaires concernant l'enseignement du concept de liaison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este dissertation consiste em um estudo 
diagnóstico, seguido pelo desenvolvimento e pela execução 
curricular a respeito do ensino do conceito da ligação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa dissertazione consiste di uno studio 
diagnostico, seguito da sviluppo e dall'implementazione d'insegnamento
per quanto riguarda l'insegnamento del concetto di bonding.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η διατριβή αποτελείται από μια διαγνωστική 
μελέτη, που ακολουθείται από τη διδακτικές ανάπτυξη και την 
εφαρμογή σχετικά με τη διδασκαλία της συνδέοντας έννοιας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta disertación consiste en un estudio de 
diagnóstico, seguido por el desarrollo y la puesta en práctica del 
plan de estudios con respecto a la enseñanza del concepto de la 
vinculación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrplanentwicklung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abhandlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">développement de programme d'études</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dissertation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desenvolvimento do curriculum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dissertation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sviluppo di programma di studi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegnamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dissertazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάπτυξη προγράμματος σπουδών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διδασκαλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διατριβή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desarrollo del plan de estudios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">disertación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
